description:
Nami strikes a thunder blast to clear the way to the stage on the Performance Floor. However, the elite corps of the Gifters shows up to crush their inferior opponents. Upset but unbroken, Otama stands up to give a command!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coup fatal de Nami. O-Tama tente le tout pour le tout !
Nami Hissatsu! Otama Kesshi no Ooichiban!
Nami`s Lethal Attack! Otama`s Desperate Challenge!
Namis vernichtender Schlag! – Otamas todesmutiger Entscheidungskampf!
Смертельная атака Нами! Отчаянный вызов О-Тамы!
هجوم نامي المميت! تحدّي أوتاما اليائس!
ナミ必殺! お玉決死の大一番!
